bluebird.activations.relu.Relu¶

class bluebird.activations.relu.Relu¶

Bases: bluebird.activations.activation.Activation

Relu activation function

function:

f(x) = 0 if x < 0 f(x) = x if x > 0

derivation:

f’(x) = 0 if x < 0 f’(x) = 1 if x > 0

__init__()¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
